bioconda.name: taxonomy_ranks
bioconda.summary: To get taxonomy ranks information for taxid, species name, or higher ranks (e.g., genus, family) with ETE3 from NCBI Taxonomy database.

biocontainers.name: taxonomy_ranks
biocontainers.summary: To get taxonomy ranks information for taxid, species name, or higher ranks (e.g., genus, family) with ete3 from ncbi taxonomy database.
